articles.description: Skoda will reveal the production ready Kushaq mid-sized SUV by March 2021. The SUV is scheduled to be launched in the second quarter of 2021, most probably in June-July. The production version of the Skoda Kushaq will mark the debut of brand’s heavily localis…

articles.title: US Giant Merck Ends Covid Vaccine After Poor Response - NDTV
articles.description: Merck & Co. is discontinuing development of its two experimental Covid-19 vaccines after early trial data showed they failed to generate immune responses comparable to a natural infection or existing vaccines.
articles.content:
Merck received interim results from its trials this month. (Representational) Highlights
